description: Mediabridge Component Video Cables with AudioConnects a DVD/Blu-Ray player, satellite receiver, game console, DVR, cable box & other A/V component to a TV or projector. This 1080i-capable cable neatly bundles 5 connectors per end: 3 video (red, blue & green signals) & 2 audio (left & right stereo), resulting in a true HD home theater presentation. Built for maximum signal strength & conductivity, this coaxial cable includes a flexibly soft PVC jacket, gold-plated RCA connectors & dual-shielding. That way, a crisp, clean picture & sound is maintained. A sleek nylon sleeve & practical color-coded molds make installation simple, without sacrificing wall space.Product Features- Connects A/V components to TV's or projectors- Coaxial cable that supports resolutions up to 1080i- 5 connectors per end: 3 video (red, blue & green signals) & 2 audio (left & right stereo)- Flexibly soft PVC jacket, gold-plated RCA connectors & dual-shielding- High-grade nylon sleeve & compact color-coded moldsCompatibilityDevices with component video & left/right audio ports, like a DVD/Blu-Ray player, satellite receiver, game console, DVR, cable box, TV & projectorInstallationPlug-&-play: Each connector is color-coded to match the ports on compatible devices. For example, the green molded connector is meant to be plugged into a green port; the blue molded connected should be plugged into a blue port & so onNotes- Verify your devices are equipped with 3 ports for component video (labeled "Y", "PB/CB" & "PR/CR") & 2 ports for audio (labeled "L" & "R")- HDMI is a different interface for A/V transfer and isn't supported by this cable- Not a composite cable, which only has 1 video connectorWarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
title: Mediabridge Component Video Cables with Audio (6 Feet) - Gold Plated RCA to RCA - Supports 1080i
